venue.address_1: Intersection of Church Street & Elm Street
venue.name: New Haven Green (includes map)

item.description:
In the spirit of "Occupy Wall St", Occupy New Haven (http://www.facebook.c... ; http://free-haven.org...) is launching on Saturday! Come down and support it! What are people protesting for? Demands vary. Common themes are about too much corporate influence in elections (new laws allowing unlimited corporate donations), too little banking regulation (exposing us to another crash & bailout like 2008), and un-fair corporate and individual income tax policies (too many loopholes and too little taxes while we're deeply in debt).

Some protesters are showing-up at 9am, before the official noon start, to make signs (I might go early too).

Some protesters will be camping-out on the Green and holding meetings there over the next few weeks/months.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine too, probably good due to noisy crowds)
item.name: Sat 10/15 - An all-day "Occupy New Haven" protest
